Html:
What is the best way to plot data on a map? The only example I can find online is here http://www.mibuso.com/blogs/ara3n

 

This guy modified the original source code, PaletteControl.xaml, to read in his own data. Surely there is an easier way than that? Otherwise whats the point in the mapping library?

 

Thanks in advance,
